entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
